author: Bryan Walsh
title: Making the most of an imperfect WHO during the coronavirus pandemic
description: The World Health Organization made mistakes in its initial response to COVID-19, but as it comes under criticism, it's important to remember the world still needs the agency. Why it matters: President Trump's decision this week to withhold money from the agen…
content:
The World Health Organization made mistakes in its initial response to COVID-19, but as it comes under criticism, it's important to remember the world still needs the agency.
